Get started

Welcome to ValidMind!

ValidMind is a solution designed to help simplify and automate key aspects of model risk management (MRM) activities for model developers and model validators alike. The platform helps automate model documentation, validation, and testing. In addition, the platform offers with built-in communication and tracking features that enable all stakeholders to collaborate and communicate effectively throughout the model risk management process, ensuring that everyone is informed and up-to-date.

How does it work?

ValidMind consists of two main products components:

  1. The Developer Framework is a library of tools and methods designed to automate model documentation and validation. It is platform agnostic, and integrates with the model development environment.

  2. The ValidMind Platform is an easy-to-use web-based UI that enables users to review and edit the documentation generated by the Developer Framework. It also enables collaboration and feedback capture between model developers and model validators, and offers workflow capabilities to manage the model documentation and validation process.

How do I get access to ValidMind?

If you are new to our products, you will need access. Check our Release access page.

How do I get started?

The fastest way to explore what ValidMind can offer is with our Quickstart.

The Quickstart takes about 15 minutes to complete and walks you through the Developer Framework with a sample Jupyter notebook and introduces you to the ValidMind Platform.

If you have already tried the Quickstart, how-to instructions for different users are in our Guides:

  • For platform administrators — Learn how to configure the platform, from setting up connectivity via AWS PrivateLink, to customizing the ValidMind Platform to suit your exisiting workflows, and more.

  • For model developers — Find information for ValidMind test plans and tests, additional Jupyter notebooks, and the ValidMind Developer Framework reference.

    Also check the Guides for how you integrate the Developer Framework in your own environment, add documentation, and collaborate with model validators.

  • For model validators — Learn how to step through the approval process after review and generate validation reports as you collaborate with model developers.

Have more questions?

We curate several lists of frequently asked questions (FAQs) that might be of help:

  • Model registration, configuration, and customization
  • Model inventory, tracking, and reporting
  • Documentation and templates
  • Workflows and collaboration
  • Testing and thresholds
  • Integrations and support
  • Data handling and privacy

Don’t see what you are looking for? Email support@validmind.com to get help from a human.
